predicate.note: Frames file for 'dim' based on sentences in ECTB 2. Verbnet class 45.4, other members include activate, age, balance, blur, darken, hasten, laminate, magnetize, revive, ripen, sicken, stabilize, sour, tilt, unwind, whiten.

roleset.name: (cause to) decrease in intensity or brightness, lessen the effect of something

example.name: dim
example.text: They carry out these actions not only because of an increase in labor rights consciousness but also because their prospects have undeniablly dimmed.
